data.text: @Chris_Ledbetter @EW @JamieBroadnax @BlackGirlNerds @BlackNerdSquad @strongblacklead @BlkNrdProblems @BlackComix Wouldn't it be great to have a virtual viewing party?

@Chris_Ledbetter @EW @JamieBroadnax @BlackGirlNerds @BlackNerdSquad @strongblacklead @BlkNrdProblems @BlackComix You're a man with a plan, Chris. Had totally forgotten about the added footages in the DVD, now can't wait for it!

@NathalieMvondo @EW @JamieBroadnax @BlackGirlNerds @BlackNerdSquad @strongblacklead @BlkNrdProblems @BlackComix I was also thinking how much I love the river scene. I need a full 30 minutes of the river scene on the Blu-Ray.

@NathalieMvondo @EW @JamieBroadnax @BlackGirlNerds @BlackNerdSquad @strongblacklead @BlkNrdProblems @BlackComix I'm sure of it. But here we are stuck inside the Colonizers' version of the narrative... For now.
@Chris_Ledbetter @EW @JamieBroadnax @BlackGirlNerds @BlackNerdSquad @strongblacklead @BlkNrdProblems @BlackComix I could go on and on. :)

@Chris_Ledbetter @EW @JamieBroadnax @BlackGirlNerds @BlackNerdSquad @strongblacklead @BlkNrdProblems @BlackComix ...and has caused the world to look down on the continent, even that same world is benefitting from us and Africa's natural resources in SO many ways. It's a breath of fresh air to see its accomplishments celebrated. Shuri isn't a myth, there are plenty of black kid geniuses  2/2

@Chris_Ledbetter @EW @JamieBroadnax @BlackGirlNerds @BlackNerdSquad @strongblacklead @BlkNrdProblems @BlackComix There is so much I recognize of Africa's history and heritage in that movie, it gets me every time. It's a feeling I can't describe, something that breaks the narrative that keeps us in tight boxes... 1/2
@NathalieMvondo @EW @JamieBroadnax @BlackGirlNerds @BlackNerdSquad @strongblacklead @BlkNrdProblems @BlackComix I still get goosebumps when I hear Pray For Me on the radio!

@Chris_Ledbetter @EW @JamieBroadnax @BlackGirlNerds @BlackNerdSquad @strongblacklead @BlkNrdProblems @BlackComix Same here. 4 within the 7-day of its release, then life got a bit crazy. But I can hear it call my name again this week. You know I can't ignore it. 😅 And when I feel down that movie picks me up like nothing else.
@NathalieMvondo @EW @JamieBroadnax @BlackGirlNerds @BlackNerdSquad @strongblacklead @BlkNrdProblems @BlackComix 4! And I want to back this weekend. Haha!
@Chris_Ledbetter @EW @JamieBroadnax @BlackGirlNerds @BlackNerdSquad @strongblacklead @BlkNrdProblems @BlackComix I gotta ask, T'Chris, how many times have you seen it, so far? :D
@Chris_Ledbetter @EW @JamieBroadnax @BlackGirlNerds @BlackNerdSquad @strongblacklead @BlkNrdProblems @BlackComix Breaking yet another record, and I think they're not done yet. #WakandaForever 👊
